front.title: Remote Triggered Black Hole filtering with uRPF

abstract.t: Remote Triggered Black Hole (RTBH) filtering is a popular and effectivetechnique for the mitigation of denial of service attacks. This documentexpands upon destination-based RTBH filtering by outlining a method toenable filtering by source address as well. It also defines a standardBGP community for black hole prefixes to simplify associated semantics.
